title: Qualified Immunity Now a Question for Congress
itunes:title: Qualified Immunity Now a Question for Congress
description:
Michael Dorf, a professor at Cornell Law School, discusses the Supreme Court refusing to take up a new test of “qualified immunity,” rejecting several appeals that challenged the legal doctrine that has become a broad liability shield for police officers accused of civil rights violations. June Grasso hosts. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
